db-user-manager.insert-user: INSERT INTO FTP_USER ( user_id, user_password, home_directory, enable_flag, write_permission, idle_time, upload_rate, download_rate ) VALUES ('{userid}', '{userpassword}', '{homedirectory}', '{enableflag}', '{writepermission}', {idletime}, {uploadrate}, {downloadrate})
db-user-manager.update-user: UPDATE FTP_USER SET user_password ='{userpassword}',home_directory='{homedirectory}',enable_flag={enableflag}, write_permission={writepermission},idle_time={idletime}, upload_rate={uploadrate},download_rate={downloadrate} WHERE user_id='{userid}'
db-user-manager.select-user: SELECT user_id as userid, 100000 as maxloginperip , 100000 as maxloginnumber , user_password as userpassword, '/folder/to/store/files/uploads/'|| user_id as homedirectory, true as enableflag, true as writepermission, true as readpermission, 100000 as idletime, 100000 as uploadrate, 100000 as downloadrate FROM FTP_USER WHERE user_id = '{userid}'
db-user-manager.select-all-users: SELECT user_id FROM FTP_USER ORDER BY user_id
db-user-manager.is-admin: SELECT user_id as userid FROM FTP_USER WHERE user_id='{userid}' AND user_id='admin'
db-user-manager.authenticate: SELECT user_password as userpassword from FTP_USER WHERE user_id='{userid}'
